name: Solitaire TriPeaks-Happy Land
description:
Solitaire TriPeaks - Happy Land! It’s a brand new solitaire card game. If you’re a fan of free online card games, pay attention to the solitaire tripeaks game! It’s much more vibrant and far more fun! When you feel bored, playing the free solitaire tripeaks game helps to relax yourself. The solitaire also helps to train your brain, and makes you feel endless fun.

No. 1 Rules of the Gameplay
※ Basic Rules: Click any card higher or lower one than the bottom visible card.
※ Special Rules: 10 special solitaire cards to play, which help or disturb in this solitaire game, as follows:
•+N Card
•Scrolling Levels
•Value-changer Card
•Spider
•Stone
•Dual-value Card
•Bomb
•Butterfly
•ICE
•Hot Balloon

No. 2 Card Challenge Mode
※Streak Challenge: Complete the specified streak and clear all cards to win various prizes;
※Star Challenge: Complete different level terms to collect more stars in the happy land map to win more prizes!

No. 3 Team Play
Create or join your unique team, share your solitaire skills with team members to complete daily team missions. Collect team points to unlock higher-level team chests to get rewards together!

No. 4 Mini Games
※Summer On A Roll: Get the dice and roll it in the map, win extra rewards.
※Carl’s Snack Time: Save your talon cards for snacks in the level , win in a row to get extra snacks, collecting more snacks to win the rewards in the tournament!
Many other mini games are coming.

No. 5 Solitaire Rewards
※Daily Goals: Complete certain tasks to win rewards;
※Lucky Wheel: The Lucky Wheel offers players free coins and other rewards. Collect a certain number of trophy to win the chance of Lucky Wheel.
※Gold Chest: After certain levels, there will be a solitaire chest as rewards;
※Gold Coins: Players can get gold coins by clicking the card in each level.

Solitaire is one of the most popular free card games, we are trying our best to bring more fun for the game. If you’re looking for the solitaire card game (classic solitaire, spider solitaire, patience, Klondike solitaire, Pyramid Solitaire, FreeCell, etc.), why not try this free solitaire card game now? Win and enjoy yourself in the card game.

Solitaire TriPeaks - Happy Land-it’s an easy and popular solitaire tripeaks game. It’s fast-paced. It takes just about 1 minute to complete one level. Whether you know its type as Tri Peaks, Three Peaks, Tri Towers, Triple Peaks or just Solitaire, Solitaire TriPeaks - Happy Land game is here free now!
Download Solitaire TriPeaks - Happy Land and have fun in the free solitaire tripeaks game!

Please note:
Solitaire TriPeaks - Happy Land does not offer 'real money gambling' or an opportunity to win real money.
Solitaire TriPeaks - Happy Land is a free card game to play, but you can make in-app purchases with real money in the game.
